auth.signUpToIThriveUsingYour: Sign up to iThrive using your LinkedIn account, email or phone number.
auth.signIntoLinkedInToContinue: Sign into LinkedIn to continue to iThrive
auth.byClickingAgreeJoin: By clicking “Agree and join”, you agree to the iThrive ?userAgreement, ?privacyPolicy, and ?cookiePolicy.
auth.pleaseEnterThe6DigitCode: Please enter the 6-digit code we sent you.

registerCompany.greatNowLetSFill: Great, now let’s fill in your company information.
registerCompany.thanksToOurHighTechAi: Thanks to our high-tech AI algorithm, we’ll make this process  as easy as possible for you, autofilling the most information we can.
registerCompany.haveToDoIsToDoubleCheck: All you’ll have to do is to double check and edit the information as necessary.
registerCompany.automaticallyFilledIn: Automatically filled in from information found from the internet about your company.
registerCompany.doYouWantToUploadAJob: Do you want to upload a job?
registerCompany.chooseFileOrDragFiles: Choose file or  drag files to upload
registerCompany.isThereALinkToAJob: Is there a link to a job that you’d like to add to iThrive?
registerCompany.maybeYouAlreadyHavePreMade: Maybe you already have pre-made job description on some link somewhere?
registerCompany.whichOneOfTheseJobs: Which one of these jobs would you like to add?
registerCompany.weFoundTheseJobPosts: We found these job posts already on the internet. Don’t worry, you’re not limited to just these ones. You can add new ones later!
registerCompany.whatAspectOfTheCompany: What aspect of the company do you need help with?
registerCompany.maybeYouWantToAddAJob: Maybe you want to add a job that you haven’t created yet or posted anywhere. No worries! Let’s follow  these easy steps to post your job!
registerCompany.greatNowLetSFillSome: Great, now let’s fill some information regarding the role.
registerCompany.allOfThisInformationWillHelp: All of this information will help us create the best and job description to match the best candidates.
registerCompany.wouldTheIdealCandidateHaveOrWhat: would the ideal candidate have or what challenge will they solve in the business?
registerCompany.thisCanIncludeInfluenceOnTheTeam: This can include influence on the team culture, business improvement, improving the product, working on a specific area of the business or the product, etc.

registerVacancy.thisIncludesPersonality: This includes personality, skillsets, mission, personal values, interest, etc.
registerVacancy.howEssentialIsThisRole: How essential is this role to the business or company?
registerVacancy.automaticallyFilledInFromInformation: Automatically filled in from information found from the internet about your job post.
registerVacancy.weLlBeAbleToGuideYouBetter: We’ll be able to guide you better in the “Market Data” page, so we can make sure that your job offer is competitive and attracts the right and the best candidates!
registerVacancy.weRecommendThatTheCandidate: We recommend that the candidate to have these following
registerVacancy.weVeFilledInSomeInformation:
We’ve filled in some information based upon the job description and in your answers. 
*****Put in a toggle for have flexibility in the salary range or not, which would show you the max that you could get, vs what we recommend for the role.
registerVacancy.youHaveFlexibilityWith: You have flexibility with the salary level.
registerVacancy.howImportantIsEachElements: How important is each elements for the candidate to have?/ How would you rate the importance of each element for the ideal candidate to have?
registerVacancy.maybeSomeCompaniesCanBeA: Maybe some companies can be a bit more flexible on one more than others; let us know about you!
registerVacancy.byWhichDateWouldYouLike: By which date would you like to have this role filled by?
registerVacancy.whatTeamWillTheCandidate: What team will the candidate be joining?
registerVacancy.youCanPutTheirContactInformation: You can put their contact information so that we can send them a link for them to make a short introduction video for some extra perks! (coins)
registerVacancy.teamMemberEmailOrPhoneNumber: Team member Email or Phone Number
registerVacancy.whatOtherInformationWillYou: What other information will you need to make a hire that you’re completely confident about?
registerVacancy.awesomeYouReAllSetForThe: Awesome! You’re all set for the
registerVacancy.wouldYouLikeToFill: Would you like to fill out the role for
registerVacancy.youCanEditAnyOfThese: You can edit any of these information later!

dashboard.searchForAnythingOnThisWebsite: Search for anything on this website

openRoles.allOfTheApplicantsIn: All of the applicants in this stage will be moved forward.
openRoles.finishFillingOutTheJobPost: Finish filling out the job post
openRoles.doYouWantToRenameTheStageInstead: Do you want to rename the stage instead?
openRoles.candidatesWillBeInformedandThisJob: Candidates will be informed, and this job posting will no longer be available for candidates to find or apply.
openRoles.areYouSureThatYouWantToDeleteThisStage: Are you sure that you want to delete this stage  of the interview?

profile.productImageDescription: Get tokens when you fill in  images and videos!
profile.customMatchingCandidatesDesciption: - filter ones with the best match from our advanced AI-algorithm to  go through the ones that we recommend for finding the ones with the best match.  Matched with the  highest matching.
profile.marketInsightsDescription: - get deeper understanding of the competitiveness of the market and competitiveness of your jobs
profile.interviewAIAssistantDescription: - auto-generates interview questions depending on your answers and what you’re looking for.
profile.asynchronousInterviewDescription: - save time by gathering interview questions and review  them on your own time.
profile.afterFrialPrice: After your free trial, you will be charged ${price} monthly.
profile.stopMembershipDialogTitle: Are you sure you want to pause your unlimited membership?
profile.stopMembershipDialogDescription: You will lose access to advanced features effective immediately, as well as erase your progress to attaining the next level of membership.
profile.membershipPausedDescription: Please let us know the reason for the membership pause.

marketData.totalJob: Total job you posted on iThrive
marketData.gainAccessPageDescription: It’s one time access as long as the data stays the same. For more details and information, click
marketData.gainAccessPageContent:
In this page you'll get:
• the competitiveness of the overall market
• competitiveness of each job category
• competitiveness of your job offer compared to the niche category
• the fluctuation of the number of competitor job posts
• the fluctuation of the number of qualified candidates in the niche job category

Giving you an edge, get information, get the best candidates to grow your business effectively.
marketData.gainAccessPageFooter: Always get access to this page
marketData.whatLikeKnowTitle: What would you like to know?
marketData.whatLikeKnowDescription: Please summarize what other information you might want to know and would like to see here!
marketData.requestSentDescription: Thanks for submitting a request! Please click on the option below if you would like to get a notification about any updates about your request.

messages.moveCandidateForward: Do you want to move this candidate forward to the next stage in the interview process?
messages.interviewQuestionsDescription: Here are the questions that our AI has put together for you to ask the right questions so that you can actually discern the candidate according to what you’re looking for in this role.
messages.feedbackAnonymousForCandidate: 'The feedback will be anonymous to the candidate. Choose one or multiple
messages.reasonForDesqualificationHintText: Feel free to put in additional information here!
